# 使用 TensorFlow 构建机器学习项目中文版（初译）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shiyong-tensorflow-goujian-jiqi-xuexi-xiangmu-zhongwenban-chuyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shiyong-tensorflow-goujian-jiqi-xuexi-xiangmu-zhongwenban-chuyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shiyong-tensorflow-goujian-jiqi-xuexi-xiangmu-zhongwenban-chuyi
shiyong-tensorflow-goujian-jiqi-xuexi-xiangmu-zhongwenban-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shiyong-tensorflow-goujian-jiqi-xuexi-xiangmu-zhongwenban-chuyi
shiyong-tensorflow-goujian-jiqi-xuexi-xiangmu-zhongwenban-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
